guides.name: Harry Dresden
guides.title: Almost a magical level of balance, fishing, and rafting.
guides.biography: Years of adventures and books of knowledge underhis belt. He has never had a negative reveiw.

guides.name: Bob Smith
guides.title: He’s an Idaho native, born and raised in the Salmon River.
guides.biography: The absolte final word on Idaho’s rivers and their history.

guides.name: T'Challa
guides.title: Former King of Wakanda.
guides.biography: As a former King he has retired to live on the river. His leadership and intelligence is unmatched.

guides.name: Dick Pound
guides.title: His unmatched expertise and competitive spirit make him an amazing coach to help learn kayaking.
guides.biography: Former Olympic river kayak. Competed in 2000 and 2004. River for life.
